title: Responsible Gaming Feature Development
description: Spearheaded multi-phase research project resulting in features that allow players to monitor activity and view behavior stats over time. Increased responsible gaming center visits by 20% and boosted awareness of responsible gaming tools.

title: Enterprise Product Experience Optimization
description: Led bi-annual MaxDiff product experience surveys at DraftKings, translating complex data into actionable insights that informed vertical-wide product roadmap. Presented findings to senior leadership to prioritize areas of focus.

title: Wellness Center Digital Transformation
description: Revamped wellness center website using seven research methods during freelance work, resulting in a 46%+ increase in patient bookings through evidence-driven design improvements.
